name: Abyssal amulet
description: Provides a significant boost to Runecrafting runes.
extraDescription:
**65%** faster Runecrafting for the following runes: Fire rune, Water rune, Air rune, Earth rune, Body rune, Mind rune
**35%** faster Runecrafting for the following runes: Mist rune, Mud rune, Dust rune
**20%** faster Runecrafting for the following runes: Lava rune, Steam rune, Smoke rune
**50%** faster Runecrafting for the following runes: Death rune, Astral rune, Wrath rune, Law rune, Nature rune
**60%** faster Runecrafting for the following runes: Chaos rune, Cosmic rune
**65%** faster Runecrafting for the following runes: Blood rune, Soul rune
**95%** faster Runecrafting for the following runes: Blood rune (zeah), Soul rune (zeah)
**65%** faster Runecrafting for the following runes: Elder rune

name: Arcane harvester
description: Increases farming and herbiboar yield by 100%.

name: Chincannon
description: A cannon that shoots chinchompas with extra ferocity and speed.

name: Clue upgrader
description: Has a chance to upgrade Beginner-Elite clues to the next tier when received as loot in PvM.
extraDescription:
**Beginner:** 40% chance to upgrade into Easy, costs 3 minutes
**Easy:** 35% chance to upgrade into Medium, costs 6 minutes
**Medium:** 30% chance to upgrade into Hard, costs 9 minutes
**Hard:** 25% chance to upgrade into Elite, costs 12 minutes
**Elite:** 20% chance to upgrade into Master, costs 15 minutes

name: Divine hand
description: A device that enhances the harvesting of divination memories, increasing energy yield by 30% and harvesting clue scrolls.

name: Drygore axe
description: Speeds up woodcutting by 30%.

name: Drygore saw
description: 40% faster construction building.

name: Dwarven toolkit
description: Makes disassembly 35% faster

name: Master Hammer and Chisel
description: Makes Crafting 45% faster.

name: Mecha mortar
description: Makes Herblore training 45% faster.

name: Mecha Rod
description: Makes fishing 45% faster.

name: Moonlight mutator
description: Mutates seeds from your bank into zygomite spores.

name: Portable tanner
description: Tans hides received from PvM.

name: Quick trap
description: Makes box-trap hunting 25% faster.

name: RoboFlappy
description: A robotic terrorbird which provides extra loot from minigames.

name: Silverhawk boots
description: Makes agility 1.9x faster, and gives up to 36k/hr passive agility XP.

name: Superior bonecrusher
description: Provides a 25% increase in XP over the Gorajan bonecrusher.

name: Superior dwarf multicannon
description: A 37-65% stronger version of the Dwarven multicannon.

name: Superior inferno adze
description: Chops, and firemakes logs. Mines, and smelts ores.

name: Webshooter
description: A handheld webshooter that helps catch implings by 30% and hunter creatures by 20%.

name: Wisp-buster
description: A device increases the speed of memory harvesting, giving 30% more xp.
